statements: SELECT * FROM clothing_inventory;
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM clothing_inventory WHERE in_stock = TRUE;
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_category = 'Shoes';
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_price FROM clothing_inventory ORDER BY item_category DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_category, item_description FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_price > 50.00;
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_category = 'Shirts' ORDER BY item_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_price > 50 AND in_stock = true;
SELECT item_category, COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM clothing_inventory GROUP BY item_category;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_price BETWEEN 20 AND 80 ORDER BY item_price ASC;
SELECT item_name, item_price, in_stock FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_category LIKE 'Pants%' AND item_price < 50 ORDER BY item_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM DesignerClothingInventory;
SELECT item_name, designer_name, quantity FROM DesignerClothingInventory WHERE price > 100;
SELECT item_id, item_name, price FROM DesignerClothingInventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT designer_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM DesignerClothingInventory GROUP BY designer_name;
SELECT * FROM AccessoriesInventory WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT item_name, designer_name, quantity FROM DesignerClothingInventory;
SELECT accessory_name, category, quantity, price FROM AccessoriesInventory WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT item_name, price FROM DesignerClothingInventory WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT designer_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM DesignerClothingInventory GROUP BY designer_name;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price FROM AccessoriesInventory;
SELECT * FROM Clothing
SELECT item_name, price FROM Clothing WHERE price > 50
SELECT quantity, item_name FROM Clothing ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM Accessories WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT acc_name, price FROM Accessories
SELECT item_name, price FROM Clothing WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT acc_name, price FROM Accessories WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT item_name, price, quantity FROM Clothing WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT acc_name, quantity FROM Accessories WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY acc_name;
SELECT * FROM FashionShow WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM designer;
SELECT designer_name, designer_specialty FROM designer;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM clothing ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT accessory_name, price FROM accessories WHERE quantity > 0;

SELECT d.designer_name, c.item_name, a.accessory_name FROM show_inventory si JOIN designer d ON si.designer_id = d.designer_id JOIN clothing c ON si.clothing_id = c.clothing_id JOIN accessories a ON si.accessory_id = a.accessory_id;
SELECT designer_name, designer_specialty FROM designer WHERE designer_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM clothing WHERE price > 100;
SELECT accessory_name, quantity FROM accessories ORDER BY quantity DESC;

SELECT show_id, designer_name, item_name, accessory_name FROM show_inventory INNER JOIN designer ON show_inventory.designer_id = designer.designer_id INNER JOIN clothing ON show_inventory.clothing_id = clothing.clothing_id INNER JOIN accessories ON show_inventory.accessory_id = accessories.accessory_id;

SELECT DISTINCT designer.designer_name, clothing.item_name, accessories.accessory_name FROM show_inventory INNER JOIN designer ON show_inventory.designer_id = designer.designer_id INNER JOIN clothing ON show_inventory.clothing_id = clothing.clothing_id INNER JOIN accessories ON show_inventory.accessory_id = accessories.accessory_id ORDER BY designer.designer_name ASC, clothing.item_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM designer_clothing;
SELECT item_name, designer_name, price FROM designer_clothing WHERE category = 'Clothing';
SELECT designer_name, item_name, category FROM designer_clothing ORDER BY designer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM clothing_inventory WHERE size = 'M' AND color = 'Black';
SELECT accessory_name, category, price FROM accessories WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM designer_clothing WHERE category = 'Shirts' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, designer_name, price FROM designer_clothing WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY designer_name, item_name;
SELECT i.item_name, i.quantity, i.size, c.designer_name FROM clothing_inventory i JOIN designer_clothing c ON i.designer_id = c.id WHERE i.quantity > 0 ORDER BY i.quantity DESC;

SELECT a.accessory_name, a.category, a.price, i.quantity FROM accessories a LEFT JOIN accessory_inventory i ON a.accessory_id = i.accessory_id WHERE i.quantity IS NOT NULL ORDER BY a.price ASC, i.quantity DESC;

SELECT f.show_id, f.show_date, f.location, d.designer_name AS lead_designer FROM fashion_show f LEFT JOIN designer_clothing d ON f.lead_designer_id = d.id WHERE f.theme LIKE 'Summer%' ORDER BY f.show_date ASC;
